snippet.title: 【IndieGame】Latest trailer for ALL-NEW Roguelike TowerDefence Game -Loopstructor
snippet.description:
A brand new trailer for the roguelike tower defence strategy indie game Loopstructor has been released!
Thank you for your attention and enthusiastic feedback on Loopstructor. Loopstructor is expected to be released in August, and the various types of vehicles in the previous demo have been split and remastered, so that players can play more and more interesting vehicles in the new version, and try out more synergies that they couldn't play in the old version of the demo! They can also challenge more unique bosses and monsters! Follow this account and add Loopstructor to your wishlist! A demo of the new version will soon be available in advance, and we welcome your demo experience and feedback to provide!
Twitter：https://x.com/MANXIAF
Discord：https://discord.gg/bn4FwBA7h5
